content: arcticsnowbird hat ©2025 ~ all rights reserved ~ kalurah hudson ~ whiletheyplaydesigns com email kalurah@whiletheyplay com for pattern support sales of finished garment is allowed reproduction of pattern or use of my photos is prohibited without written permission pattern notes finished measurements this hat was designed to compliment my snowbird blanket laying flat & blocked shawl see pg 4 knit in the round from the bottom up in depth 8 5 /22 cm a very simple three-stitch cable that resembles distant birds circumference 18 /46 cm in flight with a four-row repeat this is the perfect project for mindless knitting that will pay off with a finished hat in just a few hours worked in super bulky weight yarn for a abbreviations quick knit that s perfect for gift-giving a tubular cast on paired with the stretchy 3x1 cable stitch allows this hat to fit b or - beginning of round p - purl a wide range of head sizes hat is written in one size to fit cm - centimeter/s pg - page an average-sized adult head between 18 /46 cm and 23 /58 co - cast on pm - place marker cm see finished measurements below the hat is charted k - knit repeat - repeat and separate written instructions are included all repeats k2tog - knit two together rh - right hand appear in bold text k3tog - knit three together ssk - slip slip knit lh - left hand st/s - stitch/es mm - millimeter/s wyib - with yarn in back yarn approximately 80 yards/ 73 meters of super bulky weight yarn shown in malabrigo rasta in fog stitch guide k2tog knit 2 stitches together as one gauge k3tog knit 3 stitches together as one ssk slip first stitch knitwise slip second stitch knitwise cable stitch blocked place both stitches back onto lh needle purlwise and knit worked on us 15 10 mm needles them together through the back loops 12 stitches & 13 row = 4 /10 cm x 4 /10 cm 1/2 lc sl next st to cn and place at front of work k2 then k1 from cn 1/2 rc sl next 2 sts to cn and place at back of work k1 then k2 from cn needles for co and brim us 11 8 mm 16 /41 cm circular nee- dle or shorter for working in the round or a needle 2 sizes down from the needle size you make gauge with video links for hat us 15 10 mm 16 /41 cm circular needle or longtail tubular cast-on shorter and a set of dpn s for working in the round and https //youtu be/ye3b4vq3sj8 si=fray30eudztwm8so decreasing crown k2tog https //youtu be/6lt1dergxf0 si=mkrx- gdsm8nc21fkw k3tog https //youtu be/amvlja-4wqo si=z11h- lin-wf9zgerx notions ssk https //youtu be/r_bjg5zpkkc si=l9klqrnfcpywj3cg 1 stitch marker for bor 1/2 lc https //youtu be/emgwcuvxdpe si=t9djem- cable needle 8h_d-it0vh tapestry needle 1/2 rc https //youtu be/v-3-edeyno8 si=1kybyvvznv- blocking materials & measuring tape cluster--ib snowbird hat ~ ©2025 ~ all rights reserved
